item.title: 尽管缺乏替代品，航空公司仍试图利用波音公司的困境
item.description: 波音公司的安全危机扰乱了航空公司的商业计划，航空公司高管对波音公司感到沮丧。但在由两家公司提供大型飞机的紧张市场中，他们别无选择，只能与美国飞机制造商做生意。【原文：Airline executives are frustrated with Boeing as its safety crisis has upended their business plans. But in a tight market for large aircraft supplied by two companies, they have little choice but do business with the U.S. planemaker.】

item.title: 工会称日本服务业企业提供 2013 年以来最大加薪幅度
item.description: 日本最大的产业工会 UA Zensen 周四表示，231 家企业的平均加薪幅度达到了 2013 年以来的最大值。【原文：Japan's largest industrial union UA Zensen said on Thursday that an average pay rise offered by 231 firms reached the biggest on record since 2013.】

item.title: 研究显示：各国正逐步采用数字货币，但美国落在后面
item.description: 周四进行的一项密切关注的研究显示，目前共有 134 个国家（占全球经济总量的 98%）正在探索其货币的数字版本，其中一半以上处于高级开发、试点或启动阶段。【原文：A total of 134 countries representing 98% of the global economy are now exploring digital versions of their currencies, with over half in advanced development, pilot or launch stages, a closely-followed study on Thursday showed.】

item.title: 越南总理在银行贷款疲软之际会见当地顶级企业
item.description: 越南政府表示，越南总理范明正周四会见了该国的顶级企业，讨论在银行贷款疲软的情况下支持经济活动的措施。【原文：Vietnamese Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh on Thursday met with the country's top businesses to discuss measures to shore up economic activity amid weak bank lending, the government said.】

item.title: 达美航空公司将从 6 月 7 日起恢复飞往以色列的航班
item.description: 达美航空公司（Delta Air Lines）周三晚些时候表示，将从6月7日起恢复飞往以色列的航班，成为继10月7日哈马斯武装分子袭击以色列南部之后第二家恢复飞往以色列航班的美国主要航空公司。【原文：Delta Air Lines said late on Wednesday it will resume flights to Israel starting June 7, becoming the second major U.S. carrier to do so following the Oct. 7 attack by Hamas militants on southern Israel.】

item.title: 亚洲股市持稳；日经指数因日本央行中枢押注而受挫
item.description: 由于投资者在等待新的催化剂，以进一步明确全球利率宽松周期，周四亚洲股市维持在七个月高点附近，但多数时间横盘整理。【原文：Asian shares held near seven-month highs on Thursday though traded mostly sideways as investors awaited fresh catalysts that would provide further clarity on the global interest rate easing cycle.】

item.title: 中国批准后，日本 JIC 将于 3 月 19 日开始对 JSR 发起要约收购 - 彭博新闻社
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，日本国家支持基金日本投资公司（JIC）在获得中国监管机构批准后，将于 3 月 19 日开始要约收购芯片材料制造商 JSR 公司的股票。【原文：Japanese state-backed fund Japan Investment Corp (JIC) will start a tender offer for chip materials maker JSR Corp's shares on March 19 after it obtained Chinese regulators' approval, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 韩国养老基金支持政府推动解决 "韩国折扣
item.description: 韩国养老基金投资战略总监周四表示，该基金支持政府旨在解决股市所谓 "韩国折扣 "问题的企业改革计划的方向。【原文：South Korea's pension fund supports the direction of the government's corporate reform plan aimed at resolving the so-called "Korea discount" in the stock market, its investment strategy director said on Thursday.】

item.title: 阿尔伯马尔拍卖锂，推动价格透明化
item.description: 全球最大的电动汽车电池用锂生产商阿尔伯马尔公司（Albemarle）周三表示，作为提高市场透明度的一部分，该公司将举行数次拍卖，出售金属供应。【原文：Albemarle , the world's largest producer of lithium for electric vehicle batteries, said on Wednesday that it will hold several auctions to sell supplies of the metal as part of a push to boost market transparency.】

item.title: 前央行高管称日本央行结束负利率后将缓慢加息
item.description: 日本央行前高官早川秀夫（Hideo Hayakawa）周四表示，日本央行行长上田一夫很可能会在结束负利率政策后慢慢将超宽松货币政策正常化。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda will likely take his time normalising ultra-loose monetary policy after ending negative interest rates, former central bank executive Hideo Hayakawa said on Thursday.】

item.title: 新加坡电信股价在 Optus 股份出售报道后下跌逾 1
item.description: 新加坡电信（Singtel）股价周四早盘下跌超过1%，此前有报道称该公司正在就向加拿大布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）出售澳大利亚电信公司Optus的大量股份进行深入谈判。【原文：Singapore Telecommunications (Singtel) shares fell more than 1% on Thursday in early trade after reports it was in advanced negotiations to sell a significant stake in Australian telco Optus to Canada's Brookfield Asset Management .】

item.title: 美国库存数据和俄罗斯炼油厂遇袭事件支撑油价
item.description: 周四，石油在亚洲交易时段延续涨势，此前美国原油库存意外下降表明需求增强，而乌克兰袭击俄罗斯炼油厂后可能出现的供应中断也支撑了油价。【原文：Oil extended gains in Asian trade on Thursday after a surprise drop in U.S. crude stockpiles indicated strengthening demand, while possible supply disruptions following Ukrainian attacks on Russian refineries also underpinned prices.】

item.title: 美国新经济数据公布前汇市低迷
item.description: 周四，汇市表现平静，美元兑主要货币汇率盘整，市场参与者在等待全球最大经济体公布更多数据，以寻找美联储政策走向的线索。【原文：The currency market was sedate on Thursday, with the U.S. dollar consolidating against major peers as market players awaited more data out of the world's largest economy for clues on the direction of Federal Reserve policy.】

item.title: 独家报道欧洲监管机构称必要时将撤销对波音公司的批准
item.description: 欧洲航空监管机构代理负责人周三表示，如果有必要，该机构将停止间接批准波音公司的喷气机生产，但他对波音公司正在解决其最新的安全危机感到放心。【原文：The acting head of Europe’s aviation regulator said on Wednesday the agency would halt its indirect approval of Boeing’s jet production if warranted, but he feels reassured that the planemaker is tackling its latest safety crisis.】

item.title: 报告称，应对森林砍伐的政策给投资者带来风险
item.description: 周四的一份报告显示，在过去的一年里，全球最大经济体中旨在阻止自然损失和森林砍伐的国家政策增加了一倍，达到了22个，这给毫无准备的投资者带来了严重的风险。【原文：National policies to halt nature loss and deforestation across the world's biggest economies have doubled to 22 over the last year and posed a serious risk to unprepared investors, a report on Thursday showed.】

item.title: 报道称，飞行员座位移动是拉美航空波音航班调查的重点之一
item.description: 据航空业刊物《Air Current》周三报道，拉美航空一架波音 787 客机在空中突然俯冲，造成 50 多人受伤，飞行甲板座椅的移动是调查的重点。【原文：The movement of a flight deck seat is a key focus of the probe into a sudden mid-air dive by a LATAM Airlines Boeing 787 plane that left more than 50 people injured, aviation industry publication the Air Current reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国锂矿繁荣放缓，价格下挫打击高成本矿商
item.description: 锂是电动汽车电池的关键原材料，其价格的暴跌拖累了中国对这种超轻金属的开采，再加上开采过程成本高昂，促使中国重新评估产量增长和新项目计划。【原文：A slump in the price of lithium, a key raw material in electric car batteries, is dragging on China's mining of the ultralight metal which together with a costly extraction process is prompting a reassessment of output growth and new project plans.】

item.title: 香港销售强劲，友邦保险 2023 年新业务价值飙升
item.description: 友邦保险集团周四公布，受惠于香港市场对其保险产品的强劲需求，公司全年新业务价值（VONB）大增 33%。【原文：AIA Group reported a 33% jump in its annual value of new business (VONB) on Thursday as the company benefited from strong demand for its insurance products in Hong Kong.】

item.title: UnitedHealth 称其子公司 Change Healthcare 的药房网络已重新上线
item.description: 联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）周三表示，在遭受网络攻击数周后，其旗下 Change Healthcare 的药房网络已重新上线。【原文：UnitedHealth Group said on Wednesday that its unit Change Healthcare's pharmacy network was back online, weeks after a cyberattack.】

item.title: 生物技术行业协会将与中国药明康德拆分
item.description: 根据无锡艾普特新任首席执行官周三的一封信，一家总部位于华盛顿、代表生物技术公司的全球贸易协会正在采取措施与中国会员无锡艾普特 "分离"。【原文：A Washington-based global trade association representing biotechnology companies is taking steps to "separate" from Chinese member Wuxi AppTec , according to a letter from its new CEO on Wednesday.】

item.title: 日本卡车司机工作过度、工资过低，被工资红利抛在后面
item.description: 当日本的大公司准备发放数十年来最大幅度的加薪时，卡车公司老板坂田郁子（Ikuko Sakata）却觉得自己生活在另一个现实中。【原文：As Japan's big companies prepare to hand out their heftiest pay hikes in decades, trucking firm owner Ikuko Sakata feels like she inhabits a different reality.】

item.title: 早间竞标日本与命运的约会倒计时
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 独家报道Vista Equity 寻求利用银行进行 Solera IPO
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士周三表示，私募股权公司 Vista Equity Partners 正在为 Solera 的美国首次公开募股寻找投资银行。【原文：Private equity firm Vista Equity Partners is seeking to hire investment banks for a U.S. initial public offering of Solera, a provider of software to the automotive and insurance industries, people familiar with the matter said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 摩根大通聘请前 Global X 首席投资官担任 ETF 策略师
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co）周三表示，其资产管理部门已聘请 Global X 前首席投资官乔恩-迈尔（Jon Maier）领导一个新的全球研究部门，重点研究交易所交易基金（ETF）。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co said on Wednesday its asset management division had hired Jon Maier, the former chief investment officer of Global X, to head a new global research effort focusing on exchange-traded funds (ETFs).】

item.title: SpaceX 第三次 "星际飞船 "试飞获得 FAA 绿灯
item.description: 据美国联邦航空局网站报道，美国联邦航空局（FAA）周三向 SpaceX 公司颁发了许可证，允许该公司在得克萨斯州试射星际飞船火箭系统，为埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的卫星发射业务和美国国家航空航天局（NASA）的登月计划中至关重要的航天器的又一次早期演示铺平了道路。【原文：The FAA on Wednesday granted SpaceX a license to test-launch the company's Starship rocket system from Texas, according to the agency's website, paving the way for another early demonstration of a spacecraft crucial to Elon Musk's satellite launch business and NASA's moon program.】

item.title: 印度 Reliance 收购派拉蒙在 Viacom18 的股份
item.description: 印度信实工业公司（Reliance Industries）在一份监管文件中表示，该美国公司已同意以约 5.17 亿美元（428.6 亿印度卢比）的价格收购派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）持有的当地娱乐网络维亚康姆 18 媒体公司（Viacom 18 Media）13.01% 的全部股份。【原文：India's Reliance Industries has agreed to buy Paramount Global's entire 13.01% stake in local entertainment network Viacom 18 Media for about $517 million (42.86 billion Indian rupees), the U.S. company said in a regulatory filing.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，电动汽车初创企业菲斯科准备申请破产
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引知情人士的话报道，电动汽车初创企业菲斯科已聘请重组顾问，协助其进行可能的破产申请。【原文：Electric-vehicle start-up Fisker has hired restructuring advisers to assist with a possible bankruptcy filing, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Under Armour 创始人普兰克将重返公司担任首席执行官
item.description: 服装制造商 Under Armour 周三表示，创始人凯文-普兰克（Kevin Plank）将从 4 月 1 日起重返公司，担任首席执行官。【原文：Apparel maker Under Armour said on Wednesday that founder Kevin Plank will return to the company as CEO, effective April 1.】

item.title: 美国住宅建筑商 Lennar 因房屋交付量增加，第一季度利润超出预期
item.description: Lennar Corp 周三公布的第一季度利润高于华尔街预期，原因是现有房屋供应量处于历史低位，导致新房建设需求持续增长。【原文：Lennar Corp reported first-quarter profits above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, as historically low existing home supply led to sustained demand for new home construction.】

item.title: 耶伦称尽管中国在出口电动汽车，但美国仍在努力确保国内电动汽车制造商取得成功
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）周三表示，面对中国在电动汽车领域不断增长的出口和政府的大量补贴，拜登政府正在采取措施确保其国内电动汽车产业取得成功。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen on Wednesday said the Biden administration was taking steps to ensure the success of its domestic electric vehicle industry in the face of China's growing exports in the sector and heavy government subsidies.】
